column1: '''''tolma''''' is a [[Telerin]] word for "knob, short, rounded handle".<ref name=VT>{{VT
column2: 47a}}, pp. 10-11, 28-29</ref><ref>[[Thorsten Renk]],  [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/32555 "Telerin in VT47 and elsewhere"] (message 32555; dated 18 October 2005) at [[Elfling]] (mailing list)</ref>

column1: [[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that the word (and its meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Quenya]].<ref>[[Helge Fauskanger]], "[http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)]" at [http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion] (accessed 25 June 2011)</ref>
